PHRASE.LANG: Silver Skull - Female Reaver armor and weapon pack
Silver Skull - Femelle Pack armure et armes Reaver
Silver Skull - Reaver Rüstungs- und Waffenbündel
Silver Skull - armatura Reaver e pacchetto armi
Silver Skull - Armadura de saqueador y pack de armas

Join the feared Reaver clan with this Reaver pack. Includes the full Silver Skull - Superheavy Reaver armor set and two Reaver modified weapons, the Reaver Anvil Revolver and Reaver C-6 Carnivore Assault Rifle. This bundle contains the following items: 
 
 1. Silver Skull - Superheavy Reaver Leg Armor 
 2. Silver Skull - Superheavy Reaver Helmet 
 3. Silver Skull - Superheavy Reaver Body Armor 
 4. Silver Skull - Superheavy Reaver Gloves 
 5. Silver Skull - Superheavy Reaver Boots 
 6. Reaver Anvil Revolver 
 7. Reaver C-6 Carnivore Assault Rifle [#Legal]

Rejoignez le terrifiant clan Reaver avec ce pack Reaver comprenant l'ensemble complet Armure Silver Skull - Reaver super-lourd et deux armes Reaver modifiées, le revolver Reaver Anvil et le fusil d'assaut Reaver C-6 Carnivore. Ce pack contient les éléments suivants : 
 
 1. Silver Skull - Jambières Reaver super-lourdes 
 2. Silver Skull - Casque Reaver super-lourd 
 3. Silver Skull - Armure Reaver super-lourde 
 4. Silver Skull - Gants Reaver super-lourds 
 5. Silver Skull - Bottes Reaver super-lourdes 
 6. Revolver Reaver Anvil 
 7. Fusil d'assaut Reaver C-6 Carnivore [#Legal]

Tritt dem gefürchteten Reaver-Clan bei mit diesem Reaver-Bündel. Es umfasst das komplette Silver Skull - Superschwere Reaver-Rüstungsset und zwei Reaver-modifizierte Waffen, den Reaver Anvil Revolver und das Reaver C-6 Carnivor Sturmgewehr. Dieses Bündel enthält die folgenden Artikel: 
 
 1. Silver Skull - Superschwere Reaver-Beinrüstung 
 2. Silver Skull - Superschwerer Reaver-Helm 
 3. Silver Skull - Superschwere Reaver-Panzerweste 
 4. Silver Skull - Superschwere Reaver-Handschuhe 
 5. Silver Skull - Superschwere Reaver-Stiefel 
 6. Reaver Anvil Revolver 
 7. Reaver C-6 Carnivore Sturmgewehr [#Legal]

Unisciti al temuto clan Reaver con questo pacchetto Reaver che comprende il set completo di armature Silver Skull - Superheavy Reaver e due armi Reaver modificate, il revolver Reaver Anvil e il fucile mitragliatore Reaver C-6 Carnivore. Il set contiene i seguenti elementi: 
 
 1. Silver Skull - armatura per le gambe Superheavy Reaver 
 2. Silver Skull - casco Superheavy Reaver 
 3. Silver Skull - armatura per il corpo Superheavy Reaver 
 4. Silver Skull - guanti Superheavy Reaver 
 5. Silver Skull - stivali Superheavy Reaver 
 6. Revolver Reaver Anvil 
 7. Fucile mitragliatore Reaver C-6 Carnivore [#Legal]

Únete al temido clan Saqueador con este pack que incluye el conjunto completo de armadura superpesada Silver Skull y dos armas Reaver modificadas: el Reaver Anvil Revólver y el Reaver C-6 Carnivore Rifle de asalto. Consta de los artículos siguientes: 
 
 1. Silver Skull - Armadura de saqueador superpesada para pierna 
 2. Silver Skull - Casco Reaver superpesada 
 3. Silver Skull - Armadura corporal Reaver superpesada 
 4. Silver Skull - Guantes Reaver superpesados 
 5. Silver Skull - Botas Reaver superpesadas 
 6. Reaver Anvil Revólver 
 7. Reaver C-6 Carnivore Rifle de asalto [#Legal]
